name: Halloween Candy Fun
description: Halloween Candy Fun is a retro rhythm game that lets the user complete a level with the controller buttons. Try to complete the level with your best time. Trophies are collected as you complete the rhythm goals. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: Donut Fun
description: Donut Fun is a retro rhythm game that lets the user complete a level with the controller buttons. Try to complete the level with your best time. Trophies are collected as you complete the rhythm goals. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: An Average Day at the Cat Café
description:
Cats, ducks, and mysterious beings galore.

All manners of creatures line down the block to get your signature drinks!
But how long can you keep the cafe open, when strange customers arise in the night?

name: L.O.L Surprise! B.B.s Born to Travel: On Vacay
description: Set sail for a tropical vacay on Surf Island – and discover fierce fashion dolls, characters, stickers and local multiplayer fun only found in this colorful paradise!

name: Super Dino
description: Super Dino is a fun puzzle game designed for kids as young as 2 years old! Higher levels of puzzle difficulties provide even more fun and challenges for children of all ages.

name: Far Cry 6: Game of the Year Edition
description:
Far Cry 6 Game of the Year Edition includes the base game, all Season Pass content, all game updates, the Ultimate Pack, and the new expansion, Lost Between Worlds (coming soon).

Welcome to Yara, a tropical paradise frozen in time. The award-winning Far Cry 6 thrusts players into a modern-day guerrilla revolution. Become a guerrilla fighter and liberate Yara, in solo or co-op.

name: The Myriad
description: Welcome to my Labyrinth! I call it the "Myriad." While it's not full of traps, monsters, shifting hedges, or teleporting goblets, it is quite large....256 meters squared to be exact, and aside from a few artifacts and other collectables, it's all maze..

name: Starr Ringer
description: Grab the fate of all life in your hands. Blast your way through the cosmos, destroying monstrous cosmic beasts and the space cultists summoning them, on your path to stopping your mother from unleashing the chaos realm upon the universe, in this sci-fi cosmic horror bullet-hell, STARR RINGER.

name: Stroke the Fish
description:
Fish are normally in a tank, not the easiest place to give one of the little guys a stroke.

So we took one out of the water just for you, don't worry we also gave it the ability to breath out of water. So take this rare opportunity to give it a stroke.

name: Bite Me
description: Bite Me is an RPG. It is playable alone or online; it is composed of a Twitch integration. Improve your skills as well as your weapons and enter the legend by fighting, monsters, spectators, broadcasters, or other players!

name: Math Adventures
description: Math Adventures Innovative game showing that Math is not difficult or boring! Not at all! Game develops mathematic skills and abilities of player. Consists of series of tasks for children and teens. Each task includes four levels of difficulty.

name: Pixel Boy: The Legend of Tain
description: Play as Tain, as he embarks on a quest, to rescue his dear friend who has been kidnapped by an evil wizard.

name: Mezzanine
description: A psychotronic office adventure set in the heart of Multimedia Gulch on the eve of the year 2000.

name: One Last Try
description: Build. Fight. Survive. Play with friends or by yourself in this platform co-op game for up to 4 players. Use a Minigun, a Flamethrower, or a Jetpack. Upgrade weapons. Place your defenses. Survive longer than you did last time.

name: Try Again
description: Try Again is a zelda-like parody game and contains boss fights against Satan on Giants steps. It was made by members of the band "LORD$" to accompany their vinyl release. Contains music celebrities like Thundercat, Louis cole, Jacob collier, Anderson .Paak & a lot more.

name: 3 Crystals
description: 3 Crystals is a free twin stick shooter. Protect the Crystals!

name: Mad City
description:
You're driving your good old -but not so reliable car- when you reach a town you never heard of... No time to go around!

You forgot your GPS and phone but the sign at the city limits shows you just need to cross it from South to North, easy!

Little did you know that finding your way in this town wasn't straightforward. You will meet a range of colorful characters during you journey; some of them clearly trying to take advantage of you...

Drive through each crossroads while managing your fuel, money, car repairs and natural needs as well as escaping from thieves!

name: Rocketio
description: Rocketio is a 2D shooter in a distant space. Find strength to fend off waves of enemy ships and defeat Boss. Good luck on your journey!

name: The Jumping Chicken Wings
description: Join BIG C on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Red Haven
description: Navigate through the Red Haven complex and uncover secrets and survive!

name: Fantasy Friends Collection
description: A bundle of two fun games for players of all ages!

name: Vostok 2061
description: Vostok 2061 is a modern graphic vertical scroll-shooter. Gorgeous alien worlds, a lot of spaceships, bright explosions, secrets, various bosses, and a great soundtrack!

name: Idle Berserker: Action RPG
description: Sin descripción

name: Crossroad of Worlds: 100 Doors - Collector's Edition
description: What lies behind closed doors? What secrets lurk inside the rooms? Find the answers to these questions and make your escape! Are you ready to take up the challenge?

name: DodgeKing
description: Grab your knight and enter the robot-infested gauntlet to be the next DodgeKing! In this Action-Roguelike with Grid-based Movement, dodge, jump, and parry incoming attacks to gain upgrades, collectibles, and more! Try to deliver the lost crown in one attempt or die trying...

name: A Frog's Job
description: A soul-saving frog reaper with the power to stop time. How many souls can you save? Will the Frog God grant your wish? Find out in this challenging puzzle platformer with a unique clock-stopping mechanic

name: Tales from the Under-Realm: After Midnight
description: TFTU: After Midnight is a dark / gothic visual novel with multiple endings. Your choices matter and will determine who stays alive and who dies. Discovering the whole truth about the murders will require more than one playthrough.

name: L.O.L. Surprise! B.B.s Born to Travel
description: Fans around the world can't wait to unbox their own L.O.L. Surprise! doll - and you're about to make their dreams come true! Choose your character, collect fabulous L.O.L. Surprise! dolls full of glitter, diamonds and more, and team up with up to four friends!

name: Ultra Mega Xtra Party Challenge
description: Ultra Mega Xtra Party Challenge is a frenzied party game up to 4 players (also solo-player compliant).

name: I Got a Millenary Cat
description: The injured kitten was brought home... One day she takes on a human form! "I got a millenary cat” is a placement game in which you can observe the life of a cat girl.

name: Deadland 4000
description: A post-apocalyptic roguelike set in the year 4000. Traverse a gauntlet of randomly generated biomes collecting loot and special powers along the way.

name: Chaos;Head Noah / Chaos;Child Double Pack: SteelBook Launch Edition
description: The edition comes with a steelbook featuring exclusive art drawn by the character designer Mutsumi Sasaki.

name: Chaos;Head Noah / Chaos;Child Double Pack
description:
Two delusions become one. Enjoy both Delusional Science Adventure Series in one cartridge!
Both games feature branching paths and multiple endings. Where will your delusion take you?

name: No Man's Sky: Nintendo Switch Edition
description:
Inspired by the adventure and imagination that we love from classic science-fiction, No Man's Sky presents you with a galaxy to explore, filled with unique planets and lifeforms, and constant danger and action.

The No Man’s Sky Nintendo Switch Edition includes five years of updates that were previously rolled out for the PlayStation, PC, and Xbox versions of the game.

name: Abeyance
description: Abeyance is a roguelite, sci-fi, dungeon-crawler. Salvage wrecked starships in a gritty, post-apocalyptic world. Fight mutants and mechanized defense systems. Battle your inner demons to save your soul… and reclaim your humanity.

name: No More Future
description: Live forever, at a price...In the last days of their life, a dying person takes one final gamble... No More Future is a linear Sci-Fi Visual Novel, where you explore a futuristic world as an android trying to rebuild their old life. In this strange journey, they'll question the very foundations of their life and their world.

name: SuperPower 3
description: Superpower 3 is a modern geopolitical sim in a planet Earth setup. Rule the world or challenge your knowledge about demography, economics, military strategy, as well as political issues across the globe. Compete with or against other players, or just try to do better than the real-life politicians.

name: Swordia
description: A community driven an adventure MMORPG. We threw aside the traditional mmo and made it for gamers by gamers. The goal is to bring a classic feeling MMORPG to the scene while still using modern technology.

name: NieR: Automata - 6C2P4A118680823
description: Sin descripción

name: Soundless: Final Verse
description: An update of Soundless that adds a new epilogue, text tweaks, new art and better accessibility features.

name: Wings of Heroes
description:
Wings of Heroes is a multiplayer mobile game set during World War 2.

Become a Pilot of realistic air combat! Team up with other plane pilots and become feared ace of the skies and a master of this action flight simulator!

Dogfight in WW2 planes! Select your planes from the most iconic models of the World War 2 fleet and try yourself in epic 5v5 air combat,
You can choose your strategy whether you prefer flying a warplane or a bomber, you have to remember that you won't pilot a modern jet.
In this World War 2 flight simulator, you'll have to pilot your plane and take part in sky combat from the last century.

Fly High! See you in the skies!

name: Shadow Gadget
description: is a passive creature collecting idle game that transforms your Playdate into an online-enabled specter catcher! Take aim at ghosts and suck them into your Playdate using the built-in crank! Keep your tractor beam on target to weaken the ghost and crank for maximum pull! Your precision and reflexes will be put to the ultimate test as you collect ancient and powerful spirits!

name: SRG Mixtape Volume #4
description: Super Rare Mixtape Vol. 4 is a physical indie game collection including 30 games and 10 demos. Packaged as a USB drive shaped like cassette tape with only a limited number sold.

name: CosmiBall 3D
description: Sin descripción

name: Terror of Sea
description: 2D Multiplayer MMORPG Pirate Game

name: Neko Sagashi
description:
A cat playing in the park...
A kotatsu, a mandarin orange, and a cat...
The cat is always by my side, nya.

But as time passes, the "cat" runs away, nya...!
Before that, you can save all the "cats"
Can you find me?

name: VillageRhapsody
description: The player will play an aspiring young man who participates in the construction of a new rural area. He will use his life skills to help complete the requests of the villagers, meet the needs of the girls, improve the girls' goodwill towards you, and strive for the honor of a strong man who dares to carry water for the widow.

name: Dungeon Squad
description: A seemingly infinite stream of heroes invaded the dungeon and brought ruin to the Abyss. Now you must go straight to the source of the enemy and return your home to its former glory. Defeat the Army of Light and take back the power of the Abyss.

name: Townscaper VR
description:
Build quaint island towns with curvy streets, small hamlets, soaring cathedrals, canal networks, or sky cities on stilts. Build the town your dreams, block by block.

No goal. No real gameplay. Just plenty of building and plenty of beauty. That's it.

Townscaper is an experimental passion project. More of a toy than a game. Pick colors from the palette, plop down colored blocks of houses on the irregular grid, and watch Townscaper's underlying algorithm automatically turn those blocks into cute little houses, arches, stairways, bridges, and lush backyards, depending on their configuration.

name: CRSED: F.O.A.D. - Dieselpunk
description:
A new champion joins the game — the jack-of-all-trades Friedrich Diesel. His passion for engineering and everything connected with it has been fanatical since childhood, preferring machinery construction to communicating with people.

Diesel managed to learn the “Weird Science” ability and can create different mechanisms: a buggy, a helicopter, a spy camera, a protective wall. No laws of physics, and certainly not morality, can stop the genius of engineering on his way to victory.

name: Touch Detective 3 + The Complete Case Files
description:
This jam-packed collection features Touch Detective 3, the biggest and best point-and-click adventure of junior detective Mackenzie and her faithful sidekick Funghi, playable in English for the first time. With the arrival in town of the highly competitive detective Norman Touche, the pressure's on Mackenzie to solve cases before her rival does!

Touch Detective 3 + The Complete Case Files also includes the entire original Touch Detective and Touch Detective 2½ games, plus two bonus cases starring Funghi and an extensive museum of artwork and music from the entire Touch Detective series. Help Mackenzie and her friends as they search for clues, interview suspects and get to the bottom of one zany mystery after another!

name: Hakuoki Shinkai: Ten'un no Shou
description: A sequel to Ginsei no Shou and Tsukikage no Shou. This time, the story takes place in Kyoto, where the Shinsengumi were active in the past, and spins the story of their youth and memories that were not depicted in the main story, including incidents of various sizes that are recounted along with the events of the four seasons.

name: Escapepion
description: A Short Shooting Game for Playdate

name: Shining Gadget
description: Shining Gadget is a passive creature collecting idle game that transforms your Playdate into an online-enabled specter catcher! Take aim at ghosts and suck them into your Playdate using the built-in crank! Keep your tractor beam on target to weaken the ghost and crank for maximum pull! Your precision and reflexes will be put to the ultimate test as you collect ancient and powerful spirits!

name: Rush Hour Deluxe: The ultimate traffic jam game!
description: Can you skilfully manoeuvre the red car out of the traffic jam? Slide the vehicles blocking it in their lanes forwards and backwards – until the road ahead is clear for the red car! Not only can you play Rush Hour Deluxe alone, but go head-to-head with your friends and family.

name: My Life: Pet Vet
description: Take care of sick and injured animals in your own small animal practice. Use various examination techniques, make the right diagnosis and give your little patients the right treatment - just like a real-life vet.

name: Kawaii Solitaire 3 in 1
description: Enjoy a cute collection of three solitaire card games

name: Bunker Life
description: "Bunker Life" is a survival game to get through the Apocalypse. You need to explore various areas to obtain a new card. Acquire vehicles and expand your searchable range. Meet colleagues of various professions and join forces to survive.

name: NASCAR 21: Ignition - Victory Edition
description:
Make the most of your racing experience with NASCAR 21: Ignition - Victory Edition; the best way to enjoy the thrill and excitement of the 2021 and 2022 NASCAR Cup Series seasons in one game. NASCAR 21: Ignition Victory Edition includes the base game of NASCAR 21: Ignition, the official video game of the world's most popular stock car racing series. Also included is Season Pass 1, which features three DLC packs of 2021 content (Throwback, Patriotic and Playoff schemes) and four Legendary NASCAR drivers, including NASCAR Hall of Fame driver Bill Elliott.

NASCAR Ignition Victory Edition also includes the 2022 Season Pass which will feature three DLC packs that contain additional alternative paint schemes from the historic 2022 NASCAR Cup Series season, including Throwback, Patriotic, and Playoff schemes.

name: Tokki
description: Fun, casual platformer game with beautiful 1 bit pixel art, nice sharp controls and challenging levels.

name: Numbers & Letters
description: Numbers and Letters Practice mathematics and solve equations in virtual reality using addition, subtraction, multiplication and division. Improve your literacy skills and become better at spelling. Complete the word by finding the missing letter. Earn achievements and rank on leader boards.

name: The Waterflame Brothers
description: Explore a fantastic adventure with 3D platform mechanics, live an exciting adventure created specifically for two people. Play split-screen and take on ever-changing challenges that can only be won with co-op!

name: Neuro Horror
description: Psychological horror in format of a visual novel, created using a neural network.

name: Magical Girl Clicker
description: Click & idling! Gather the hearts of cute girls and see their naughty appearance!

name: LonlyToy
description: Pass through various obstacles and descend to the next level when you have reached the signpost after crossing all obstacles and mechanisms.You can buy HP at the store. When you end the game due to a trigger mechanism in the middle of the game, you can continue the game from the position before the trigger mechanism by consuming HP instead of restarting.

name: Pretty Ninja Himekage
description: This is the story of a group of girl ninjas who fight against "Super Insect Fortress Antross", which has come back from the ancient world. The story part proceeds in the form of an adventure game, and there is also a battle mode against ant-men.

name: Barold
description: A hard 2D fantasy platformer with unique boss fights and bullet hells.

name: Flawless
description: Flawless （完美无瑕） is a third-person puzzle adventure game about a nightmare a schoolboy dreamed about. This third-person puzzle adventure probably could help you fix your relationship with your parents.

name: Spy Swatter 2
description: Spy Swatter 2 - Bad Dudes have stolen Top Secret Files and scattered them all over the World ! Travel to Cool Locations and Get The Bad Dudes, Get the Files and Save us ALL !

name: Stunt Legends
description: Drift, speed and all sorts of stunts await you in this unique and innovative game. The realism of the details will envelop you until you feel the movement of the pistons in your bones. Stunt Legends is an explosion of colors and adrenaline. Speed and fun with no limits.

name: 8 Ball 2
description: Drive the crowd wild with your skills.

name: CosmoPlayerZ
description: Sin descripción

name: Isekai Musume to Konkatsuchuu: Isekai Bride Hunting - Meir Edition
description: “Isekai Musume Hatsujouchuu”, released in 2019 from the bishojo game brand Calcite, has been remade for the CS Novel Club platform. Meir Edition is a short version that includes a story focusing on a friendly cat-eared girl named Meir.

name: Forest Dongmul
description: Play as a cute lamb as he tries with his friend to return to the mysterious FOREST that he once grew up in. (With cute 2D pixelated top down graphics.)

name: Poker World: Casino Game
description: FEEL THE EXCITING VEGAS CASINO ATMOSPHERE AND WIN BIG MONEY!!

name: Memory
description: The game that unites and delights generations!

name: Maze Blaze
description: Maze Blaze is filled with endless possibilities. Lock and load, then enter at your own peril.

name: Castle Renovator
description: Build your own kingdom and customize it to your liking. You start on your own inherited piece of land. Work as a craftsman to clean, repair, build and decorate medieval, renaissance and baroque buildings and castles. Visit beautiful locations, breathe new life into old rooms and as you know - hard work pays off - so maybe one day you will become the King?

name: CubicBan
description: CubicBan is a minimalistic Sokoban-based puzzle game where you need to move the cubes to their respective places. Use the triangle block to push the square blocks to the place with square sign in it.

name: Her World
description: We invite you to experience this chillingly sweet romance.

name: Nonno Lorenzo
description: Farm, cook, explore and level up in Nonno Lorenzo! An exploration driven farming and cooking RPG where you run your own pizzeria. With an old farm at disposal, you must grow ingredients, level up and explore the island to make it the happy community it once was.

name: Soul Searching
description: In this puzzle stealth game, your soul has been captured by an evil necromancer determined to take over the lands! Can you escape his perilous dungeon home to warn the kingdom before the undead rise and take over the throne?

name: Super Jagger Bomb
description: With retro-styled 3D graphics and mechanics that are easy to pick up and play but tough to master, Super Jagger Bomb offers a straightforward and rewarding gameplay experience.

name: Solanaceae: After All
description: Join Battam, a witch exiled by all conventional covens, on his quest to make a brand new type of coven! Explore a colorful world, gather ingredients for potion brewing and cooking, immerse yourself in a long and detailed story, and view sexy scenes!

name: Reimus Awesome Holiday
description: Its Reimus Day off. But her day is ruined by an unknown force in Gensokyo! Play as Reimu to find out what this mysterious group is about and uncover their secret!

name: All Hallows Evie
description: All Hallows Evie is a Halloween themed single screen style platform game moulded on the 8 bit classics of the ZX Spectrum.

name: Midnight Saga: The Monster
description: When a quiet Halloween night turns into a thrilling adventure, make sure to grab a weapon, eat candy, wreck monsters or leave them for dead!

name: Nier: Automata - The End of Yorha Edition
description:
NieR: Automata tells the story of androids 2B, 9S and A2 and their battle to reclaim the machine-driven dystopia overrun by powerful machines.

The NieR: Automata - The End of YoRHa Edition includes the game itself and comes packed with DLC and bonus content for the full experience of the award-winning post-apocalyptic action RPG.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit II

name: Chuhou Joutai 3: Three Nights of Scarlet Abscess
description: Pandemonium will break loose if you don't unleash your rage.

name: Purgatory Dungeoneer
description: A roguelite RPG about plundering a psychic hellmaw for personal closure, and the resources to build a town beyond the grave. Become the mayor of a supernatural medieval village. Recruit over 400 former adventurers to plunder the hellmaw for resources, and unlock the buried memories of your companions. Use these resources to improve the village, and the capabilities of your citizens. And strive to keep a personal touch as the village grows beyond your expectations.

name: Grizelda: Lynx and the Nine Lives
description: Join Lynx on an adventure to rescue a princess and collect 9 souls. A retro-action RPG filled with puzzles, dungeons, and treasure.

name: Vacant Kingdom
description: Vacant Kingdom is a synthesis of bullet hell and story-driven action-RPG. Explore a whimsical yet desolate land and rally its adrift people by solving their problems.

name: Triple Take
description: Triple Take is a fast 2D precision platformer where the stage evolves as you complete it! Run, wall jump, climb and swim through increasing difficult levels in vibrant colored worlds!

name: Runner
description: Runner is an arcade-inspired VR driving action game. Pursued by the forces of the Caldara corporation, Players must race through 7 sectors while fighting off relentless waves of autonomous corporate combat drones in this heavily stylized retro-futuristic anime-inspired VR arcade shooter.

name: FireJumpers Inferno
description: FireJumpers Inferno is a 3D cooperative multiplayer wildland firefighting game on an epic scale! With over 3.5 billion pixels of GIS data mapping out the western United States, it's really a professional training tool disguised as a game!

name: Federation77
description: Federation77 - a dynamic VR arena shooter filled with violence, brutality and stimulants. Shoot, chop and dismember a marginalized society in VR. Post-Soviet cyberpunk and reactive rhythmic gameplay.

name: Flip Tale
description: On the way home after work, the leading character saw a streak of light and a little boy. Suddenly, he found that he had been in a different world and got an ability to "flip". The player has to interact with the world by the ability to "flip" and finally find out the truth of the whole story.

name: Bombergrounds: Reborn
description:
Bombergrounds is a free-to-play multiplayer action-based bomber game. Engage in solo- and team battles in both fun and competitive game modes, or simply find a new friend in the Bombergrounds community.

Will you be victorious? Lets find out!

name: Motioning Monument
description: This game that need a little imagination, exploring the abstract landscape and aim of revive mysterious monument. Collect motion fragments and place them in the right place to revive the monument. Enjoy the exploring and letting your imagination run wild!

name: Feindlich Sewers
description: Medium sized castle / medieval sewers map with Makkon textures. Requires Copper v1.19+ (NOT included). The author's first release.

name: ParaNichi: Magical Romance
description: A mobile otome game.

name: The Temple of Nightmares
description: Medium-sized elder world map with medieval and wizard elements, classic vanilla id1 style.

name: Sulfur
description: It looks that the latest volcano eruption was so strong that some hellspawn were ejected in addition to lava... Approximate playtime around 20 minutes. Classic map (no jumping etc.).

name: Hell Let Loose: Upper Echelon
description: Unlock access to join the Upper Echelon and take command of the front lines with these unique uniforms for the Commander Role. Show off your rank and station with the "Field Blue Heer Officer" uniform for the German forces or stride out in your "Summer Service" uniform for the US.

name: Plust: Loving U So True
description: Otome game by Voltage.

name: Fire Emblem: Binding Blade Plus
description:
The goal of this project is to take all the amazing hacks from the Fire Emblem GBA hacking community and put them into the base game experience. These are designed for veteran players and newcomers alike! The changes are designed to be uncontroversial enough so that this isn’t seen as an “alternate” way to play the game but an “enhanced” way. The major changes are QOL and bugfixes. The only gameplay changes come from removing localization changes.

Here are the changes present in all versions:

Adds Casual Mode
Unlocks Hard Mode at start
Prevent Misheal bug
Fimbulvetr glitch fix

name: Knights of the Zodiac: The Phoenix Returns
description: Knights of the Zodiac: The Phoenix Returns is a fan game created for the Game Boy Color that retraces the beginning of the animation (from the moment where Seiya gets his armor) and follows the battle against Ikki.

name: Birdie Shot
description: Birdie Shot is a casual golf game where you can create your own golf team and compete with other players on golf courses around the world. Build a team of 8 characters and compete against other players in casual PVP golf matches. Upgrade your characters, equip them skills and items to gain the upper hand and make profit. You can earn the in–game currency 'Gold' by winning against other golfers in multiplayer matches, which you can exchange for BIRDIE Tokens and BORA crypto tokens. Meet and play fiercely with masters from all over the world. Collect rewards and make money!

name: Teenage Super Ninja Plumbers
description: The sewers of The Mushroom Kingdom have been infested by teenage mutant ninja turtles, It’s up to Mario and Luigi to save the day by becoming Teenage Super Ninja Plumbers!

name: Dreamspace
description: DREAMSPACE is a turn-based RPG with low poly graphics along with pixel art reminiscent of a PSX game! Battles happen from a front-view perspective, with a timed attack system similar to a rhythm game!

name: Tower Song: Eternal Knight
description:
This is a playable prelude to the game that became Tower Song.

Short story told in the RPG Maker MZ engine, with turn-based combat and top-down exploration. Players build a four-character party from seven different playable characters and classes (berserker, brawler, engineer, hedge witch, knight, mystic and sniper).

The land is plagued by monsters and earthquakes, but a group of plucky adventurers are out to set things right. Little do they know their mission is already doomed - and at the hands of one of their own.

name: Please Don't Litter
description: A PS1 style game where you have to collect garbage.

name: Battle Thunder Front: The Lost Red Sea
description: The background of the game is based on the fictional Red Sea War, and players can fight in the form of small teams or large units. The game also supports custom play mode configurations for combat.

name: Meteor Mess
description:
Meteor Mess 3D is a remake of the graphic adventure game, Maniac Mansion. It's a fan project and a homage to a game that has a special place in our lives.

This version contains new rooms, objects and puzzles and even a completely new way to solve the game.

name: Pixel Chan
description: Pixel version of cute girls in relaxing puzzle game.

name: Napped
description: Napped is a pixel first person horror game where you take the roll of a reporter on his way to the biggest story in his life.

name: Light Kin
description: Don't let the calming fire fool you in this chaotic Bullet Hell style game. Rise to the challenge as you reach new heights while collecting embers of your own kin. Release them all in a satisfying display of fireworks and rack up your score! Can you rise up and burn your mark on the leaderboard?

name: The First Mountain
description: A Simple 2D Platform Game.

name: 4X4
description: Survive in a limited space of 16 spaces divided into 4x4 spaces, avoiding obstacles with different themes on each stage

name: Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 2 - Collector's Edition
description:
The Collector's Edition includes:
8 extra locations with even more things to find!
8 more mini-games to solve!
Downloadable wallpapers and soundtrack to revisit Europe whenever!
Add exclusive postage stamps to your album!

name: The Pigeon Quiz
description: Do you want to learn some amazing facts about the pigeons? We have the right game for you The Pigeon Quiz.

name: Stroke the Rabbit
description:
Rabbits come in all sorts of colours, but they take up quite a lot of space and make quite a lot of mess.

With Stroke The Rabbit you can have all the fun of a rabbit without the mess and without the hard work.

They also like to run away but here it will be safe and sound sitting in front of you waiting to be stroked.

name: Puzzle Park
description: Welcome to the puzzle park! You will meet with a lot of puzzles scattered across the park. Solve them and get stars that will help you move forward. Choose your own path on which you will go, because the game is completely non-linear and with an open world.

name: Ryclaw: Hope
description: Ryclaw: Hope is a short kinetic novel about a young girl named Sakura who has spent most of her life in the hospital. Coming home for the first time in months, Sakura has a dream that she wants to make a reality. You play as her older brother, who has raised Sakura since the passing of their parents. Spend time with your precocious little sister and help her wish come true.

name: Rivalia: Dungeon Raiders
description: Rivalia is a singleplayer ARPG and Roguelite video game, with a cartoon art style that combines the best of both genres. In it, you will take control of 4 main characters who must confront the evil jester who has wrapped the castle of Rivalia in a space-time loop.

name: The Grim Nightmare of Nibras
description: The Grim Nightmare of Nibras is a story with the search for objects in gloomy locations.

name: Bibots
description: Bibots is a top-down shooter rogue lite set in a futuristic world. Play as Tayar, an explorer in control of a nervy robot and clear rooms filled with monsters, powers and secrets to unveil. Die, try and repeat until you face your world’s final threat.

name: Blood Nova
description: Princess Love is set to assume the throne of a powerful galactic empire. But when conspirators try to thwart her ascension, Love and her best friend Kel become stranded on an interstellar lighthouse. Prove Love worthy of rule in this thrilling point and click adventure game.

name: The Plague Doctor of Wippra
description: The plague spreads fear and agony in the small town of Wippra. As a doctor, you help where you can. Then medieval superstition and religious zeal mix into a deadly threat.

name: Homecoming
description: It is an indie psychological horror game in which you must solve the mystery behind the Dewey family while various entities try to hunt you down and torment you. Will you be able to survive and escape this infinite loop?

name: Aeternum Vale
description: Aeternum Vale is a melodic & atmospheric pixelart Metroidvania adventure set in a handcrafted 2D open-world full of dangers & mysteries. Fight, make friends & find your way through a living, breathing, interconnected world brimming with secrets.

name: Manafinder
description: Take the role of Lambda as you are exiled from Manahill and thrown into the beautiful but unforgiving world of Aevi in this Japanese-style turn-based pixel-art RPG. Become a manafinder and seek the manastones as you battle against ferocious beasts and other threats as you fight for the survival of the exiles.

name: Parallel
description: Parallel is a first-person (third-person optional) RPG adventure game, you will explore a parallel world with a new civilization. Each player will go through different environments, from mysticism, paradise to claustrophobic and destruction scenes. Your choices can change the course of story.

name: Falling Out
description: Falling Out is a lighthearted action platformer with procedurally generated levels that offer a challenging experience every time you play. Take control of an odd cartoony couple and protect your partner from peril. Have complete freedom while you explore the fully-destructible pyramids of ancient civilizations filled with deadly creatures, booby traps and immense treasure.

name: Waveform Wipeout
description: Waveform Wipeout combines the fast paced action of pulling off a sick combo of tricks with the novelty of rhythm games. The levels are generated based on the song you pick, so the possibilities are endless.

name: Domino Earning World
description:
It is the first platform for this game, based on blockchain that unites millions of domino enthusiasts in a community where they will be able to buy and create their own NFTs such as avatars and accessories.

In addition, they will be able to organize games including tournaments in gaming centers. DEW will combine multi-million dollar video game-based marketplaces and a popularized millennial game, all merged by blockchain and NFT technologies.

There are not many video games that offer players the opportunity to generate real profits. We believe there is a huge opportunity in the video game market with “play to win” features.

This is skill-based gaming with the potential for real-world monetary rewards. The slow digitization and lack of transparency of the NFT gaming market, gave us the ability to see the great niche for the creation of Dominoes as NFT.

Online domino game platforms with modern graphics, extensive gameplay possibilities and, most importantly, blockchain is what the market wants.

name: 1428: Shadows over Silesia - Deluxe Edition
description:
The deluxe edition includes 1428: Shadows over Silesia, the soundtrack and two written stories from the world of the game.

1428: Shadows over Silesia
Medieval Europe is in the middle of religious upheaval and many a preacher predict the imminent end of the world. Immerse yourself in a dark fantasy story with true historical events in the background. You'll be facing intricate puzzles, challenging battles and cunning stealth.

Soundtrack
Listen to the soundtrack, which contains most of the in-game music from 1428: Shadows over Silesia. The tracks were composed by a trio of composers - Dark Fantasy Studio, Matyas Vonz and Jan Valta. Some of the tracks are originally composed for the game. For example, God Warriors is a variation on the medieval Hussite chant "Ye Who Are Warriors of God".

Bonus stories
This DLC contains two PDFs with unique short stories from the world of 1428: Shadows over Silesia. Read on to embark on your next adventure with Hynek and Lothar. The stories are available in two languages - Czech and English.

name: Retro Abyss
description:
You Have Loved Games Since You Were Little.
But You Have Grown Up Without Defeating The Final Boss.
The Final Boss Remains In Your Heart And Leads You Into The Retro Abyss...

name: Overwatch 2: Watchpoint Pack
description:
The pack includes the following Overwatch 2 in-game content: Season One Premium Battle Pass, 7 Legendary skins (including 2 all-new Space Raider skins), 5 Epic skins, 2,000 Overwatch Coins and instant access to all 35 Overwatch Heroes.

With the Season One Premium Battle Pass you can unlock over 80 Tiers of rewards including Mythic Cyber Demon Genji, Legendary Hinotori Kiriko, and more. In addition, as a Season One Premium Battle Pass owner you will automatically receive access to Overwatch’s latest hero, Kiriko!

name: Pimp My Water Gun
description: "Pimp My Water Gun" is a tile-based 2D squirt gun builder. The player selects stock-parts from a library and arranges them in "builds" on a canvas. Your aim is to score a high "Coolness" rating. Parts and their logics have a meaning within your build. Reasonable designs with a high degree of customization beat uninspired builds. It's a "kitbashing" simulator and a creative challenge.

name: Overwatch 2: Season 1 - Cyberpunk
description:
New heroes join the fight and all-new rewards await in Overwatch 2 Season 1, including the Season 1 Battle Pass, which offers players 80 tiers of rewards through the season.
As a part of the free track, players can earn and unlock Overwatch 2’s new support hero “Kiriko”, Epic skins, and a collection of new cosmetic items.

name: Train Sim World 3: Santa Fe F7 Add-On
description: Warbonnet beauty! An American legend with perhaps the most famous face in railroading history, reminisce in the stainless-steel days and take on the challenge of mastering steep grades aboard the Train Sim World 3: Santa Fe F7!

name: Train Sim World 3: Rail Head Treatment Train Add-On
description: Water tanks full, 2 locomotives raring to go, it’s Autumn and the tracks need a good blasting - power wash your way to success with the Train Sim World 3: Rail Head Treatment Train!

name: Train Sim World 3: Dispolok BR 182 Add-On
description: Dispolok delivering duties await – climb aboard the sleek and stylish EuroSprinter dressed in iconic yellow accents, ready for service on nightly fast freight trains with Train Sim World 3: Dispolok BR 182!

name: Needy Dragons
description: Adult-Only Visual Novel featuring 3 dragon-girls, comedy, and plenty of sex!

name: Citri Plays Noirwood
description: Citri Plays Noirwood is a short game where you play as a vtuber who is playing a horror game. Search for the 7 relics and avoid the monster in Noirwood, while increasing your viewers by keeping chat entertained as you play!

name: ChatFight!
description: ChatFight! is a battle royale for stream viewers. Play the game on stream and let your viewers customize their characters, equip ridiculous outfits, and fight to the death!

name: RunOut
description: “RunOut" is a 3-player action game in which you control unique robots to blow your opponents into a hole!Exhilaration of attackExhilaration due to the sound and direction released when an attack hits!

name: Reilla: Sweets Adventure
description: A magical world full of sweets! The heroine, Leila, is a wizard girl who loves sweets. She comes to the world of sweets with her "Sweets Parasol," a magical umbrella that turns sweets into power!A magical sweet adventure filled with sweets begins now!

name: The King of Fighters XV: Team Samurai
description: [Product Contents]- Haohmaru, Nakoruru, and Darli Dagger of "Team Samurai" can be used in The King of Fighters XV

name: Ignite
description: Magic attack by command input, requires precise operation and instantaneous power. The "Score Attack Battle" is all about eliminating large numbers of enemies and surviving longer. How can you conquer "Ignite"? A magical experience like no other!

name: CustomBullet
description: Endless customization and exhilarating robot action!Speed, power, size, all at your own will.An overwhelming sense of speed that runs through the body.Huge craters and concrete jungles create high-speed battles.Game for Robo-Game Fans.

name: Predictors
description: When the wizards get bored, they begin to arrange battle royales between the brave heroes and the hordes of evil spirits. Choose a hero, manage his plans and predict the moves of opponents. Play against artificial intelligence, as well as with your friends - in cooperative and PvP modes.

name: The Game Store
description: You get to pick out a game from the Game Store in town but do not choose a certain game.

name: Search All: Keys
description: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the keys in a large location. The keys will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

name: Super Nova Party
description: Prove to your friends that you're the true hero of the galaxy in an out-of-this-world party game! Win minigames and reach distant planets to save the most escape pods before Nova implodes.

name: Toynip
description: ''Toynip'' is a cooperative tower defense game for 2 players! Two players cooperate to fight off an army of stuffed animals that are invading your castle.

name: Derp Souls
description: Flailing, Flatulence. It's fine. Some appliances have kidnapped your blowup doll soulmate, so go save her!

name: Crazy Edition of Stunts
description: Have you ever imagined what it's like to do all kinds of acrobatics with a car at heights like above the clouds?

name: Race Journey: Nitro
description: Join this Race Journey thorough the racing in the pimped car with nitro. Enjoy the graphics with the best tunes.

name: FerroSlug
description:
The super-intelligent little ferrofluid, which has gained the ability to move. You will need to find your way out of the levels you are on.

Filled with puzzles with movement by squares and starring a super-intelligent ferrofluid, you must reach the finish line of each level! During the game new movement mechanics are learned, behind each level there is a window from which the scientists observe us, who will move from behind to give the sensation of being in a real laboratory.

name: Blueprints
description:
Blueprints is a 3D third-person parkour platformer game where the more levels you beat, the prettier they get.
Experience beautiful natural (and not natural) landscapes in this short casual adventure you are very likely to forget.
Play all sorts of parkour challenges (and a random 2 minutes of holding [W]) in this 3-hour adventure of a lifetime.
It's not quite an adventure of a lifetime, but still a good adventure.

name: From Hell
description: Arise, Demon! In this arcade style action roguelike you must master your movement and acquire an arsenal capable of slaying angels and heroes. Storm the castle within the time limit and slay the King!

name: Skala
description: Skala is a puzzle game about changing the scale of the world.

name: Card Cowboy
description: On a quest for revenge in the wild west, how you play the cards you're dealt determines your fate.

name: Dakar Desert Rally: Deluxe Edition
description: Dakar Desert Rally is the biggest off-road rally racing adventure ever developed. Experience the speed and excitement of the largest rally race on the planet, featuring a wide variety of licensed vehicles from motorcycles, cars, trucks, quads and SSVs.

name: Let's Sing ABBA
description: Celebrate the glorious comeback of the Swedish pop giant ABBA. Party solo or with your friends to some of your favourite classics from the band's repertoire! Choose from a collection of 31 ABBA classics and perform them in seven different game modes.

name: My Universe: Puppies and Kittens - Panda Edition
description:
My Universe: Puppies and Kittens - Panda Edition new content:

- New missions to discover
- Improved graphics
- New treatments and mini-games to help your little patients
- 2 new dog breeds & 2 new cat breeds: Dalmatian, Border Collie, Abyssinian, and Devon Rex
- After completing your various missions, you will unlock a mysterious patient seeking expert veterinarian advice

name: Nailed It! Baking Bash
description:
Calling all home bakers! Host a party for your pals to see who creates the best-looking – or worst-looking – cakes in this game based on the hit series.
Welcome to the most frantic and creative baking competition. Grab a group of friends and see who can best re-create the game's edible masterpieces. Can you nail it?

name: A Steak Temple Panic
description: Deux agents secrets doivent apprendre à collaborer lors de la mission la plus périlleuse de leur carrière : récupérer un artéfact Aztèque magique caché dans un parc d'attraction appartenant à un multimilliardaire qui fait frémir le monde de par sa terrifiante réputation.

name: Dakar Desert Rally
description: Dakar Desert Rally is the biggest and most epic off-road rally racing adventure ever developed. Experience the speed and excitement of the largest rally race on the planet, featuring a wide variety of licensed vehicles from the world’s top makers, including motorcycles, cars, trucks, quads and SSVs.

name: 1428: Shadows over Silesia
description: Shadows over Silesia is a dark action adventure game with fantasy elements, set in real medieval Europe. With true historical events in the background, you can mainly expect challenging puzzles and difficult battles, but also stealth scenes and important decisions. You will come across possessed devil worshipers, sexual demons, and beasts from hell, as well as creatures well-known from European mythology.

name: Vault of the Void
description: A CCG roguelite experience. Use your sideboard to swap in and out cards as you progress, perfecting the ultimate combos. Upgrade & customize your cards with Void Stones, infusing them with new abilities to help defeat the insidious minions that stand between you and The Void.

name: Trails of the Black Sun
description: Trails of the Black Sun is a first-person shooter and platformer hybrid, set in a digital simulation, where you, an Initiate, will have to find hidden artifacts and forbidden meanings. Use your acrobatic skills and defeat your enemies, fulfilling your ultimate Quest.

name: For Whom the Bell Tolls
description: You wake up in room and are told to pull a lever every 10 seconds. Unsure what else to do, you start pulling the lever and begin trying to figure out what’s going on.

name: Blink
description: Every time you blink, you teleport somewhere new. Can you take control of this curse, and find loopholes to use it in your favour? An open world puzzle where you learn the rules as you play.

name: Choo Choo Crossing
description: I'm crossin here!

name: The Rust Forge
description: Medium / large runic base map with "void vibes", built on progs_dump 3.0 (already included). Some sounds from Arcane Dimensions, custom music "Yss Éskiuth" by Immorpher. Map source is included.

name: Yard of the Dead
description: An E1M1 limit removing map for Heretic.

name: Poda Wants a Statue
description:
Play with your mouse!

Drag and drop bunnies and resources.
Click on upgrades to buy them.

name: The Night Owl Murder
description: You need to solve the case before a chip in victim's head runs of out time. However, the time passes ONLY through your actions. So feel free to read and listen to dialogues in your own pace. Time passes only when you click on a dialogue option. Time is limited so choose wisely!

name: Every 10 Seconds I Find New and Exciting Ways to Hate Myself
description: Sin descripción

name: String Art
description: Use strings to make your art!

name: TurnKee
description:
A pixel art turn-based dungeon crawler where you choose to move one tile every turn.
You are Monkee. You're in some dungeon. There's keys in the rooms. They might be useful. There's enemies. Probably should avoid them...

name: Machine Yearning
description: You are a robot applying for a job. The poster of the job wants to keep humans from applying. To do this, they have prepared a captcha system with a new captcha every 10 seconds that only robots should be able to solve. Can you keep track of the language you’re building, or will your tiny human brain collapse under its own weight?

name: Marins Dream Garden
description: Manage a garden by finding the seeds scattered throughout the dream islands.

name: Clockmachine Chaos
description: Oh no! The clockmachine is broken. It's up to you to save it!

name: Babs' Potion Shop
description: Have fun bullying our sheep/witch Babs! 15 transformations in 1.0 and a juicy victory screen starring Babs and her loved one.

name: The Potion Shop
description: You are Ryo, a guy that has a potion shop with his boyfriend, Aimer. Ryo is a great alchemist so he has to create some potions, but he is really anxious. Can you help him do those potions?

name: Thwack
description: Funky-legged tennis

name: A Simple Job
description: A tile based puzzle-ish game that uses the Playdate's crank control.

name: Blaster
description: Let's play a new twin stick shooter arcade game called Blaster

name: Rhythm Any Music
description: Play using your own music and get into the rhythm with amazing backgrounds that are automatically generated by your music.

name: For Amerta
description: Again and again, just to save her.

name: Timore Remake
description: Official remake of the original Timore, that was released in 2014. Mannequins, darkness, blood, loneliness and horror.

name: Adventure with Firefly
description: This is a a nonsenscial story about Matchstick Men!

name: Maze
description: A Marble Maze Game for Playdate

name: Hack the Planet
description: Hack The Planet is a roguelike set in a 90s retrofuture all about hacking Netpol, the cops who rule the internet, alongside your BBS of hacker friends. Bypass firewalls, vandalize nodes, and get into petty arguments with your friends as you hunt for the score of a lifetime: The Motherlode.

name: ChamberLocked
description: After you were stunned you found yourself in an abandoned house. You got out of bed and tried to leave the room only to find that the door was locked. However, you heard the door outside the room open...

name: Air Defenders
description: A small and interesting air defense simulator. Don't let enemy missiles reach their target!

name: Coin Flipper
description: Heads or tails? Coin Flipper is an idle clicker game that is all about flipping lots of coins. Upgrade your coin flips and get even more coins to flip!

name: Running into the Cyberpunk
description: A wanted criminal trying to outrun the robots. Robots that are trying to put a stop to her escape. How long could you last in this cyberpunk universe? Run into the cyberpunk to find out!
1990 is a fun, casual RPG with turn-based combat.

name: Cursed Crops
description: Play with up to 4 players as a group of conspiracy addict farmers as you defend farmlands built on haunted land from the cursed vegetables that rise during the harvest.

name: Tear Factory
description: A game about hunting rats, feeding them to your family, and going to bed.

name: Fix My Legs Doc
description: Who will take care of our health if not us? Fix My Legs Doc, is a simulation game in which you have the chance to be a Doctor, where your mission is to help different patients to heal their legs to feel good.

name: The Dungeon of Naheulbeuk: The Amulet of Chaos - Back to the Futon
description: Once again, your favourite party of unlikely heroes are in a bit of a pickle: arrested by the Dungeon's Fund, they have to accomplish a dangerous mission to earn back their freedom.

name: Kitty's Venture
description: Join the kitty in a challenging fast-paced adventure to hunt for achievements. Kitty's Venture is a 2D side-scroller platformer game where you take control of a cute kitty. If you are a Steam achievement hunter, and love cats, then this is the game for you!

name: Nick Bounty: The Goat in the Grey Fedora - Remastered
description: A complete modern remaster of the award winning Point & Click detective comedy adventure game.

name: Shogunaria
description: Shogunaria is an action-adventure RPG that takes elements from old school classics like Zelda, YS, Neutopia, Golden Axe Warrior, and Diablo. Select one of the 4 characters and take on a series of dungeons filled with traps and enemies!

name: Once Again
description: “Once Again” is an interactive story game about a boy who spends his summers wandering between past and present. After meeting her, summer will never be the same again.

name: If it's for My Client, I'd Even Schedule a Demon Lord
description: Pencil in time on your calendar for this parodical planner puzzle game more like work than any other! This witty career will have you solving schedules for everyone from your brother to a demon lord.

name: Agni
description: Agni is a runner game, help a mysterious cat to collect fragments through different landscapes and enjoy an endless mode for scoring!

name: Stellar Monarch 2
description: Feudal space empire builder where you feel like the Emperor, not a logistics officer. Great noble houses, usurpers to the throne, rebels, assassins, court intrigues, disloyal admirals, incompetent governors and ever-present alien threat.

name: BomberGuys
description: BomberGuys is a top-down multiplayer game with simple controls. In fact, apart from movement, the player only has one ability: placing bombs. Each bomb explodes in four directions, the explosion can destroy enemies or destroy brick blocks. In the blocks you can find bonuses that increase the range of the explosion, you can place additional bombs or increase the speed of your character. The goal of each player is to destroy all enemies and remain alone on the field.

name: Beyond the Storm
description: Beyond the Storm is a love-letter to the iconic shmup Tyrian, bringing back the same experience from the past while adding improved visuals, new stories and a lot of more content!

name: Monster Outbreak
description: Monster Outbreak is a 2D pixel game, where you will need to survive waves of monsters coming from every direction. Enchant your weapons, build your base, and see how long you and your team can survive!!!

name: Stitched: Mother's Nightmare
description: Stitched: Mother's Nightmare continues the story of Stitched, putting the player in control of a protagonist named Mia as she ventures in the mysterious doll factory. Why did she come there? What horror awaits her in the factory?

name: Marauders
description: Become a space pirate and work solo, or in a squad of up to 3 other players to navigate a hostile battleground, survive intense combat encounters with other teams and AI opponents for invaluable loot, craft new weapons and gear, and salvage what you’ll need to survive.

name: Gigabuster
description: Fiery action platformer focused on fluid movement and combat. Jump, dash, shoot and swing to stop mergers with the GEC, a monopoly funding "Happiness.

name: Lost Amulets: Mystic Land
description: It's a unique combination of hidden object fun, tile-matching puzzles and challenging mini-games. The magical amulets held the five natural elements in balance. Restore harmony with nature by finding the lost amulets.

name: Rakudo yo Ori he
description: Ren Kijirushi is captured by a strange religious group that dwells in a village deep within the mountains and is made their "God". So begins his new life within a prison, taken care of by a boy named Takumi Natsume. Until a few years ago, Tatsumi himself had borne the title of "God", and he hates Ren for currently holding the position.

name: Zippy the Circle: Calculator
description: Sin descripción

name: Ichigokuruiza
description: A go-shintai. Ren Kijirushi has been kidnapped and placed in charge of curing believers' illnesses by sharing his blood with them. Takumi Natsume, once in the same position as Ren and nicknamed "the child of the gods," is assigned to look after him. Through repeated rituals and exchanges, the two are...

name: The Warmest Body in the Room
description: Small dark semi-linear single-player map with minimalist brushwork and texturing. Map source is included.

name: 10 Second Backdoor
description: 10 Second Backdoor is a speed/reaction-based puzzle game where you guide humans toward doors scattered around levels.

name: Princess of Nothing
description: Simple little F/F fantasy I made in a day to test out RPG Maker MV. Might expand on it, might not. Have fun.

name: Pinball Kingdom
description:
Pinball Kingdom this is a combo of popular arcade game and the Tower Defense.

You know the rules! Use your flippers to destroy enemy buildings and defense your kingdom. You play like a regular pinball, but the goal is different. You must defend your kingdom against a pinball ball and destroy enemy buildings using the same ball. The Pinball Kingdom game starts with a very simple kingdom, but you can upgrade it to become a very defensive one. In Pinball Kingdom season one, players play versus humans, but in season two we plan to add Orcs, Monsters, new bosses with skills, more kingdoms, and balls with passive effects.

name: My Sacred Place
description: My Sacred Place is an action strategy RPG for the MSX in which you have to protect your village's garden from the clutches of the fearsome Garks.

name: Alchimia
description: After 10 long years of studying you can finally fulfill your dreams - opening your own potion shop. Ludum Dare 51 game.

name: The AMC Squad
description: The AMC Squad is an epic story-driven FPS running on the Build Engine. It combines gameplay mechanics of retro-shooters with aspects of modern titles, complete with a story-driven narrative that spans over several episodes.

name: Trace
description:
You find yourself trapped in a strange place...

Solve the hidden puzzles to escape!

name: Glass Masquerade: Origins
description:
Welcome to Glass Masquerade - an artistic puzzle game inspired by Art Deco & stained glass artisans of the 20th century. You need to combine hidden glass pieces to unveil clocks and themes exhibited by various cultures of the world at the 'International Times Exhibition' - an interactive electronic show.
The Origin's edition includes all the previously released DLCs

name: Inside Jennifer
description: Sin descripción

name: Koopa CD
description:
Koopa is sent to the past by the Toads in the future as they plan to corrupt everything in that time.

This was a submission for the SMB Jam 22, and it is a small but complete overhaul of the game. This entry scored 3rd place out of the 11 contestants.

name: The Curse of Tencond
description: The Curse of Tencond is a short adventure game, where your player character is afflicted by a terrible curse, making them die every 10 seconds and start their journey all over again.

name: My Star-Crossed Girlfriend
description:
After studying abroad in Italy, you're finally home and eager to meet up with your childhood friend. But while the two of you are talking, someone catches your eye—a beautiful girl from a rival school.

As days pass, you find yourself stuck in the middle of a love triangle! Will you choose your trusty best friend who's always been there for you, or will you go down the path of dangerous star-crossed love?

name: WitchCraft TD
description: Open the ancient portal and defend the crystal from waves of mysterious enemies! As an apprentice witch your magic is quite random so you have to come up with some strategy to make the best out of your luck.

name: Zad Maldan My Bloody Sacrifice
description: First person hack-n-slash shooter horror game. Blood and gore with partial nudity.

name: Sex Adventures: BDSM Dungeon
description: An erotic visual novel about a young couple who hires a Dominatrix. Everything takes a turn when she starts explaining the rules.

name: Generations
description: A puzzle game about organization and family.

name: Classic Journey: Nitro
description: Join this Classic Journey thorough the racing in the pimped car with nitro. Enjoy the graphics with the best tunes.

name: Grove Island
description:
Trapped on a small island, you are being stalked by multiple entities but you must keep your light sources alight while you try to search the island for anything useful...
Keep your campfire and torch lit, if both go out, who knows what may be bold enough to come for you. Search the Island to collect relics but be wary of those who are watching from the shadows.

name: Adrian's Tale
description: One day most of the animals disappeared and Hero has to find out what happened the night when animals have disappeared and bring them back. For this purpose the Hero has to travel a lot, search for various items and weapons as well as solve puzzles, fight against enemies and bosses.

name: The Jumping Pumpkin: Turbo
description: Join Big P on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Stroke the Parrot
description:
Parrots are pretty amazing creatures, hey can copy us, and sometimes outsmart us. This one probably won't do that, but it can certainly be stroked.

This is your chance to have a nice pet Parrot without all the mess and work that comes with them, just the stroking.

So stroke it until you are all Parroted out.

name: Kattish
description: Kattish is 2D Puzzle-Platformer Game, Our main character is a very sweet cat, But she has to pass these levels quickly. Are you ready to pass the challenging levels with plain graphics? It's not as easy as it looks.

name: The Odarian Accounts
description: Follow Cedric on his adventure as he tries to get his home and family back after events take place uprooting all that he knows, and throwing him into a world of chaos.

name: Unscramble Heroes
description: A word game based on unscrambling various words in a generic fantasy RPG setting with levels, talents, Steam Achievements, Steam Leaderboards, and Steam Cloud Save support.

name: UptownRanger's Halloween
description: Sin descripción

name: The Missing Trail
description:
Today's the day of the Annual Halloween Bonfire! But why is it so... quiet?

The Missing Trail is a short visual novel about community, communication, and Halloween! Follow Tom the ghost as he investigates the mystery of the missing forest trail with the help of his new monster friends! But be careful… there may be mischief afoot!

name: Undertale Gameboy Demake
description: Sin descripción

name: PJ Masks: Hero Tech
description: Sin descripción

name: Peppa Pig: Super Laptop
description: Sin descripción

name: Prism
description:
Born to a city of wonders beyond your reach, scarcity has always been a close friend. As a courier, the city’s human infrastructure, you scale its roofworks, evade its constables, risk death every day for others’ convenience — until opportunity crosses your path, and you’re allowed to discover what you believe beyond survival.

Given a scrap of power, how do you reinvent yourself, your relationship to the city, its people? Will it allow you to maintain a companionship based on mutual struggle?

And, beneath it all, from where do the canals in this desert flow?

name: Puck-Man Puzzler
description:
This is Debiru's second NES game made with Retro Puzzle Maker. Here is the description on what he says about his homebrew:

"Puck-Man Puzzler I couldn't exactly copy Pac-Man, or steal any graphic's from his existing games, so I had to make my own original Graphics, which are not that great as my Puck-Man isn't animated an is based on a Square but it works for now this is just the first Demo, of what may or may not become a full game. It only has 8 levels..

Unlike Pac-Man there are no Ghost, Enemies, or Power Pellets in this game instead you just collect the coins then go to the exit to proceed to the next level. This is just the concept I am trying out for now in future versions it may be a bit different."

name: Banjo-Kazooie: Gruntylvania
description: Sin descripción

name: The Archivist and the Revolution
description:
A woman alone in a dying city, on a dying world. What will be left when it all falls apart?

The Archivist and the Revolution is a slice-of-life/romance/history simulator set in a far-future sealed city that has undergone cycles of destruction and revival. You play as Em, a middle-aged woman who is no longer an archivist, as she struggles with rent payments, chronic illness, and the remnants of past relationships.

name: According to Cain
description:
Two brothers. One murder. And a mystery as old as mankind.

You are a medieval investigator sent back in time to learn the secrets behind mankind's first murder. Using a novel alchemy system, observation, and your wits, you must discover the untold truth about Cain and Abel.

name: Gaia: A Protetora da Natureza
description:
Get ready to go on an adventure and help Gaia protect Planet Earth, which is being invaded by aliens with the ability to blend into the soil of the region where they landed.

Use your water and wind equipment, cause erosions on the enemies, and thus prevent them from destroying nature.

name: Intergalactic Xenology Trilogy
description: These maps are intended for Boom compatible, UMAPINFO enabled ports. This trilogy combines enhanced versions o﻿f the first two episodes of the series with some new maps that make up the third episode. We used UMAPINFO to create an episodic structure (with new story text at the end of each episode!), so a port that supports the format will need to be used to play.

name: Dawn of the Damned
description: Anxious to attend your job interview at Aurora Antiques, you arrive to discover a room full of melancholy mannequins. One, in particular, captures your interest, drawing you closer.

name: The Graveyard Shift
description:
Created by Melancholy Marionette using Naninovel x Unity.
Based on a script by Reece Shearsmith & Steve Pemberton (Adapted, altered, and added to by Melancholy Marionette).

name: Havoc in Creation
description: Havoc in Creation is a short episode for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards led by 40oz.

name: Goat!Goat!
description: Goat!Goat! is a casual puzzle game where you need to remove blocks by matching 3 in a row! Sounds easy? Not so fast! You never know how deep the puzzle goes, or what lies underneath!

name: Champions Ascension
description: Ready your Champions for battle! Collect, train, equip and manage your own stable of brave and brutal gladiators. Define your own story, and influence the world of Massina. Who will you become? A battle master, an ingenious alchemist, a rich Imperial business magnate? Enter a player-driven fantasy world of arena-based combat where death is real— but so are the rewards.

name: A Long Way to the Nearest Star
description:
A thief on the run from the galactic police finds refuge on an abandoned spaceship. A lonely ship AI finds unexpected company.

Explore the ship, solve puzzles, uncover mysteries, and befriend an AI who probably isn't trying to kill you.

name: Unfair
description: You're a young lawyer, offered a last-minute murder case to defend you can't reject... or win...

name: Fire Emblem: Bells of Byelen
description:
"Fire Emblem: Bells of Byelen" is a Mod of "Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones".

Built with a telephone-hack system, Team Adversity worked together to build a mechanically rich and story dense custom campaign, with many inspirations taken from "Fire Emblem: Thracia 776", like capturing enemies, fatigue, leadership stars, stealing weapons and more. Bells of Byelen boasts 73 playable characters, 60 on any given playthrough, with 24 chapters and 3 interludes.

name: Gospel of Eve
description: An exorcist that doesn't believe in ghost. A drop-out that's lost about his path in life. The duo's adventure continues in this sequel to Silver Thread as they investigate an allegedly haunted church!

name: Glimmer
description: It's bleak out there. No one would blame you for turning away.

name: Picta Mori
description: When first seemingly harmless achievement in technology turns into something sinister is not an unknown scenario to us. Picta Mori plays with the idea of what if AI image generator would start predicting people's deaths.

name: Graveyard Strolls
description:
The sky is grey. The sun is setting. You’ve never been a believer in ghosts, but they still want to tell you all their secrets as you wander their graveyard.

Become a ghost therapist as you explore a graveyard at night.

name: Use Your Psychic Powers at Applebee's
description: You are a Psychic Brand Ambassador for Schtupmeister Beer. Listen to the thoughts of customers at the local Applebee's and convince them to try your syrupy ale. But will being in these peoples' heads convince you to get involved in their lives?

name: Under the Bridge
description: Survive as a monster that has taken up residence underneath a bridge, interact with strangers who pass over your bridge and see if you can not only survive the encounters, but create a home for yourself.

name: Chase the Sun
description: It's the end of the world and everyone's handling it in their own way. A game about running, family, and death.

name: The Grown-Up Detective Agency
description:
The only thing Bell Park likes more than a mystery is solving it on her own. But when a time-travelling 12-year-old version of herself lands face-down on her rented co-working desk, she'll have no choice but to take the displaced kid detective along on her latest case.
Follow the trail of a missing heterosexual on the strange streets of Toronto! Investigate a quirky cast of drag kings, chicken wing enthusiasts, and women in elaborate cat make-up! Thrill in the pervasive ennui of your early twenties! Struggle to remember where your preteen self was at with the whole being gay thing!
Will Adult Bell make peace with the figurative and literal ghosts of her past? Can Kid Bell navigate the uncanny world of the 2020s and find her way back home? How's the chicken in that creepy basement food court? These questions and more will be answered in THE GROWN-UP DETECTIVE AGENCY.

name: Waste It
description: Waste it, flush it! The best game of 2022

name: Stray Cat
description: Is a game about a homeless cat who decided to save money for a new home. 2D platformer with a side view, where you will play as a brave cat who decided to collect all the coins on his way and destroy evil opponents.

name: Square Off
description: Square Off is a mayhem filled local party arena brawler where you must roll to move, move to aim, and aim to win by battling it out with up to 3 of your friends in short-chaos filled matches.

name: The Absence of Miriam Lane
description:
Sometimes people give pieces of themselves away.
Sometimes they give too much and who they are wears thin.
They become an absence. A hole in the world.
And a terrible Light shines through.

name: Snug Finder: More Fun
description: The fun continues: new levels are coming! There are more hidden items, and you can start finding them now. Start solving 24 new unique levels of Snug Finder!

name: Girl and Chainsaw
description: In a world after the zombie pandemic disaster.A third-person 3D action game with an emphasis on control and exhilaration, where you smash zombies and other creatures while spraying blood with a chainsaw like in a B-movie!

name: The Eyes of Dr Kautzmann
description: The Eyes of Dr Kautzmann is a first-person point-and-click detective game inspired by German expressionist cinema. Solve environmental puzzles to uncover the tragic history and secrets of a doomed town.

name: Cryohazard
description: Inspired by classic point and click games, Choose Your Own Adventure books, and B-grade horror films, Cryohazard is a short story of waking from cryogenic sleep in a dilapidated research facility full of mystery, mayhem, and monstrous mutants. Multiple endings and numerous gruesome deaths are abound in this game designed for the original Game Boy, compatible with emulators and real hardware.

name: Weird RPG
description: "Weird RPG" is a highly difficult and fast-paced action RPG game focusing on boss battle,

name: Driverio
description: Driverio learns to drive better and improves his experience. Help Driverio get over different obstacles and most importantly get the highest score you can!

name: CielClou
description:
It is a first person shooter.
As you defeat enemies, the % in the upper right corner increases,
and when it reaches 100%, the boss will appear.
The game ends when all five sides are cleared.

name: The Capybara P
description: The clicking adventure you and your friends need. Eat grass with the main hero of the game The Capybara P and eat all the grass in the world!

name: Stellar Fight
description: is a 2D arcade game. The main goal of which is to kill all the enemies on the field and get points...

name: Hazelnut Hex
description: A strange curse falls across the land! Breakfast everywhere has disappeared, and it's up to you to save the most important meal of the day! Blast your way through 5 colorful stages jam-packed with dangerous enemies, dense bullet patterns, and ruthless bosses to rescue breakfast once and for all!

name: Alien Holocaust
description: Based on the short film of the same name, Alien Holocaust is an adventure game for the Atari 2600 where you must dodge the aliens, explore the scenarios, collect items, and, above all, try not to go crazy!

name: Lights Out: TPP Shooter
description: Planked! Survive & Thrive is a multiplayer adventure, crafting, and building game. Work together or alone to gather resources, craft items, and fight your way around the island, but beware, not all pirates are friends!

name: Boomshine Plus
description: A simple and easygoing, but addictive puzzle game

name: Home Deco Puzzles
description: Memorize, Unpack, Decorate! Home decorating mixed into a puzzle game!

name: Chatbotaged
description:
Chatbotaged is a twitch interactive Chase horror game built in Unreal, where the player assumes the role of an unnamed clone, developed solely for the purpose of testing and demonstrating the effectiveness of Genespliced weapons developed by a company called Pyontech Industries.

The clone's task is to find the correct keycard in a contained space, while avoiding and potentially escaping the Weapons.

To raise the stakes, there's a timer, and Twitch Chat has the ability to "bend the rules," in ways that modify the game's behavior.

Will the player escape? Will the clock run out? Will Chat have mercy? There's only one way to find out!

name: Finrendly
description: High-speed one-step action using squares.

name: The Bathhouse
description: The Bathhouse is a Japanese horror game.

name: Purple War
description:
Purple War is a classic RTS game that supports up to 8 online multiplayers.
Players gather resources to build base and troops, and take down enemy with various tactics and strategies.
The game is fast-paceed, intuitive and easy to learn.

name: Prehistoric Marine Monsters
description: PMM is an aquatic based, semi-realistic, open world survival game, where the player dives into the experience of growing up and trying to survive in an unforgiving ocean as a prehistoric marine creature.

name: Zleepy
description: Zleepy is a difficult 2D platformer where you control a super sleepy character that falls asleep every few seconds. Your goal is to get to the bed at the end of each map without dying. You have to keep your character awake, use your abilities and fall asleep in the safest places possible!

name: The Alchemist & His Battle-Scarred Homunculus
description:
A heartwarming tale of two broken people finding a new life together!

This heartwarming and dramatic tale follows Rakels, the young alchemist who helped create living homunculi to better the lives of mankind, only to have his partner betray him and turn their creations into tools of war. After years of exile for speaking out against their use as weapons during the war, Rakels discovers the battered form of Mel, a homunculus who was discarded by a slave trader.

As the two begin to confront their traumatic pasts together, a new bond is formed that helps them heal and forge a loving future together. Sweet and tender moments abound as Rakels and Mel face their fears of society and intimacy to truly come together as a couple.

name: MP3: Loserville
description: Sin descripción

name: Laws of Attraction 2
description: Laws of Attraction, Book 2 is the second and final book of the Laws of Attraction series. It succeeds its first book, Laws of Attraction, Book 1.

name: Deltarune - Spamton Restitched
description: a fan-made sequel to the Spamton Neo fight.

name: Null Bearing Redux
description: Large industrial dock-themed map with lots of exploration, using Makkon and MG1 textures. This is an updated overhaul / redesign of the author's previous release Null Bearing (2020).

name: Road To Siren Hills: Dark Journey
description:
Your car has died in the middle of nowhere.
The only thing you see is darkness and a flashlight lying on the grass.
Your only option is to go on foot, but where will the journey lead you to?

name: Pokémon Odyssey
description:
This is a crossover project between Pokémon, Made in Abyss, and Etrian Odyssey. It’s a sort of dungeon-crawler story-driven, , but you don’t need to know anything about Etrian Odyssey or Made in Abyss in order to fully enjoy this game!

On the island of Talrega lies the entrance to the Yggdrasil labyrinth, a gigantic desert carved from the roots of the tree of life over millennia; filled with treasures and other valuable items, it attracted explorers from everywhere. What are you looking for? Fame? Money? Or do you just want to test your coaching skills by tackling the maze? What’s at the end?

name: Sweet Blend
description:
Ever wanted to have your very own mutual pining, friends-to-lovers coffee shop romance, complete with a best friend to gush about your feelings to?

Then you're in luck!

Meet Avery Mercier, your only solace in the pit of despair that is a 9-5 office job...

And your longtime crush.

Experience the embarrassment/joy of finally making a move to ask him out on a date (or not, whatever floats your boat) and getting to know him better over a nice, casual cup of coffee.
